data.eml:eml: A new family of poecilostomatoid copepods (Strepidae fam. nov.) associated with the sun coral, Tubastraea coccinea Lesson, 1829 in Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cheng, Yu-Rong, Liu, Shang-Yin Vanson, Dai, Chang-Feng (2016): A new family of poecilostomatoid copepods (Strepidae fam. nov.) associated with the sun coral, Tubastraea coccinea Lesson, 1829 in Taiwan. Zootaxa 4174 (1): 346-354, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4174.1.21
